text: Sure, summer ’ s great and all. But every basic b * * ch knows that fall – aka pumpkin spice latte season – is the best time of the year. Hence, E! has compiled a list of 11 pumpkin spice - flavored items that you can buy at the store year round : Creative Snacks Co.
